name: Facebook bigger chatbox
description:
Almost doubles the size of the mini-chatboxes in the lower right corner.
Compatible with other styles. No fancy stuff here, just what you want: bigger chatboxes!

user.name: John Fiddle
user.about:
I hate ugly websites.
I love redesigning them.

additional_info:
uses simple and short css code, so it's:
- compatible with other styles
- easy to change for individual needs
